note.p: Birth: In the parish of Stamford All Saints, [Lincolnshire?],England (19 November 1740)
Death: Lambourne, near Ongar, Essex (04 May 1780)
Education: BA (1764), MA (1767), BD (1775) Corpus Christi College, Cambridge
Career: Ordained deacon 1770; Rector, Lambourne, Essex
References: L B Glyn, 'Israel Lyons: a short but starry career. The life of an eighteenth-century Jewish botanist and astronomer' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 275-305
